cleaned_text: [ ](https://www.eliteintegrativemedical.com/blog/understanding-migraines-and-how-to-prevent-them) Understanding Migraines and How to Prevent Them Migraine headaches affect millions of people, and while there's no cure for them, there are some things you can do to help prevent them. If you suffer from migraines, here's how we can help you get relief.
